question: Chillai Kalan, sometimes seen in the news, is related to which of the following?
option2: Tourism spot in Jammu and Kashmir
option4: Harshest period of winter in Kashmir
answer: Harshest period of winter in Kashmir
explanation: The Chillai Kalan is the 40-day harshest period of winter in Kashmir when there is high frequency of snowfall and maximum temperature drop. Â It is followed by the Chillai-Khurd (small cold) that lasts for 20 day. Chillai Khurd is succeeded by the 10-day Chillai-Bachha (baby cold).
